Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron felt a pain fill Optimus. They held a special link for eons. He 
sent a hologram image of himself. "Hello my old friend. He showed a picture 
of Magnus's last moments..."Your brother's spark is mine! You will be next!" 
He flew  and landed infront of the Destron base. He walked in and looked at 
the photograph he had taken of the map. he found a suitable room. He layed on 
the floor and slept. Guiledart and Megatrom by his side guarding him.

--part1_34.1047d5d1.27aa0115_boundary
